lc_text.description: In this task, read the given text and then answer the given questions. Spend approximately 10 mins per task.

lc_viz.description: In this task, interpret the visualization and then answer the given questions. Spend approximately 10 mins per task.

termsboard_text.description: In this task, based on the given list of documents, write a report about a given topic. Spend approximately 20 mins per task.

termsboard_viz.description: In this task, based on the given list of documents and termsboard visualization, write a report about a given topic. Spend approximately 20 mins per task.
